name: Two decimals number
description: Usefull for texinput number restrictionxample:private function changeHandler(event:Event):void{var reg:RegExp = /^([0-9]*(\.?[0-9]?[0-9]?)?)/g;var parts:Array = reg.exec(TextInput(view).text)if (parts && parts[0]){TextInput(view).text = parts[0];}else{TextInput(view).text = '0';}}
